Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25193 affecting package harfbuzz for versions less than 3.4.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-25193 affecting package harfbuzz for versions less than 3.4.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package harfbuzz is earlier than 3.4.0-3, affected by CVE-2023-25193
